General.Name: Renrenle Commercial Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Renrenle Commercial Group Co.,Ltd. operates hypermarkets, boutique supermarkets, boutiques, department stores, and online shopping supermarkets in China. It operates 128 stores in Guangdong, Shaanxi, Sichuan, Tianjin, Chongqing, Guangxi, Fujian, Hunan, Jiangxi, and other provinces. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: North of Zhoushi Road, Shenzhen, China

4.Name: Mr. Hui Ming  Cai
4.Title: VP & Sec. of the Board of Directors
